creator: Richard Harding Davis
description:
LibriVox recording of Outside the Prison by Richard Harding Davis.
Read in English by Crln Yldz Ksr
On Christmas Eve, journalist Bronson is sent to wait outside of Moyamensing Prison to report on the release of a certain infamous prisoner. His case had gotten a lot of attention, so the paper wants a man on the spot. However, what Bronson hears and sees outside the prison that night is not quite what he was expecting. - Summary by Carolin
For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.

Download M4B (22MB)
subject: librivox; audiobooks;
title: Outside the Prison
